title: New 95g Selle Italia SLR Boost Tekno Superflow saddle gets race car tech
content:
Designed in collaboration with race car engineering firm Dallara and multi-time champion Fabian Cancellara, the new Selle Italia SLR Boost Tekno Superflow gets race-ready shaping and a remarkably light weight of just 95 grams. And like most things to do with carbon and Indy or IMSA racing, itâ€™s expensive. If you thought the new Specialized
